actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the income level applicable to joint returns at which unemployment compensation becomes taxable.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income level, in the case of a joint return, above which unemployment compensation becomes includible in gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the income level applicable to joint returns at which unemployment compensation becomes taxable.
